name: Shopperb
tag_list: shopping, social-shopping, comparison-shopping, social-shopping-network, wishlist, shopping-profile, shopping-advice, coupons, product-reviews, clothing, style, inspiration, shopping-lists
overview: Shopperb helps shoppers connect, share curated lists, and find the lowest price. Users can follow thier favorite brands and stores as well as other shoppers to get new trending fashion ideas updated daily in their news feed. A price comparison feature allows shoppers to find the lowest price on every product. By creating and following curated product lists users can organize their shopping and generate new ideas for themselves and others.
